Package view

Class StartView

java.lang.Object
view.StartView
Direct Known Subclasses:
MainMenuView, MainMovieListingView, MainSearchMovieView, MovieDetailView, MovieGoerBookingFilterView, MovieGoerBookingHistoryView, MovieGoerBookingShowTimeView, MovieGoerMainView, MovieGoerPurchaseView, MovieGoerReviewingView, MovieGoerReviewView, MovieGoerSeatingView, MovieGoerViewMovieView, StaffAddMovieView, StaffEditMovieDetailsView, StaffMainView, StaffPHView, StaffShowTimeView, StaffSystemSettingsView
public abstract class StartView extends Object
This is the base View class. All the subsequent views class will be the subclasses of this class. This class helps to define the basic structure of View in our application. A BaseView has 3 basic components: the title, the view content as well as the options for user to choose and interact with.

    void
    activate()
